docs.snippet: Dixons Carphone, Britain's biggest consumer electricals and mobile phone retailer, said on Wednesday it was confident it would continue to grow its market share even if the vote to leave the European Union leads to an economic downturn....

headline.main: Dixons Carphone Says Can Prosper After Brexit Vote

docs.snippet: Chinese Premier Li Keqiang said on Tuesday he wouldn't allow the post-Brexit panic that roiled global currencies and stocks to send the country's financial markets into a tailspin, an indication authorities would intervene if needed to prevent mar...
docs.lead_paragraph: Chinese Premier Li Keqiang said on Tuesday he wouldn't allow the post-Brexit panic that roiled global currencies and stocks to send the country's financial markets into a tailspin, an indication authorities would intervene if needed to prevent market chaos.

headline.main: China's Li Won't Allow 'Rollercoaster' Markets After Brexit
headline.print_headline: China's Li Won't Allow 'Rollercoaster' Markets After Brexit
